channel.description: Recent content in Home on Kamaete

item.title: Black/brown belt
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Tobikomizuki/Nagashizuki/Gyakuzuki Basic 3: Otoshi barai & stand up technique Basic 4: Mawashi uraken

item.title: Blue belt
item.description: Basics Basic 6: Kakato geri Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Mae geri/Gyakuzuki/Zenshin Shiite/Joden uke/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 2: Mae geri/Yoko geri/Mawashi geri/Gyakuzuki Solo Combination 3: Mae geri/Mawashi geri/Sokuto/Ushiro geri/Gyakuzuki

item.title: Green belt
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Kick/Punch (Kette junzuki) Basic 2: Front kick/Opposite punch (Kette gyakuzuki) Basic 3: Tobikomizuki from shizentai Basic 4: Sokuto Chudan Basic 5: Mawashi geri nikai Basic 6: Nidan geri Pairs Pair 1: Overview (Mawashi geri/Tobikomizuki/Gyakuzuki/Ashi Barai/Kizamizuki) Pair 1: Defence (Body shield/Chop block) Pair 2: Attack (I forgot to defend my head on the stunning elbow strike) Pair 2: Defence (Nagash-uke/Empi/Mawashi empi/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki) Pair 2: Defence (Nagash-uke/Empi/Mawashi empi/Ashi barai/Tobikomizuki)

item.title: Yellow/orange belt
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Step and punch in zenkutsudachi Basic 2: Gyakuzuki from zenkutsudachi Basic 3: Front kick/Mae geri Basic 4: Step up sidekick/surikomi sokuto

item.title: Yellow belt
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Step and punch in zenkutsudachi Basic 2: Gyakuzuki from zenkutsudachi Basic 3: Front kick/Mae geri Basic 4: Step up sidekick/surikomi sokuto

item.title: Red/black belt
